title: Ouids banquet of sence A coronet for his mistresse philosophie, and his amorous zodiacke. VVith a translation of a Latine coppie, written by a fryer, anno Dom. 1400.
author: Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.
publisher: Printed by I[ames] R[oberts] for Richard Smith,
notes: The "Latine coppie" is "Phillis and Flora", attributed to Walter Map. In a separate reprinting (STC 19880) this translation is attributed to R.S. Esquire, i.e. Richard Stapleton?.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
